Text.Value: RFID evaluation unit for up to 4 read/write heads
RFID evaluation unit for PROFINET-IO V2.3.3
Customer value, see setting IDT_PHY1_CTRL_VALUE2 of this GSDML file
Customer value, see setting IDT_PHY2_CTRL_VALUE2 of this GSDML file
Channel number is set over plugin the module into slot 1..4
Data hold time for inputs, UID and transponder present bit TP
Data block length of the transponder, can be obtained from data sheet of the transponder
Overload detection on output power stage at IO-1 ... IO-4
Overcurrent detection on output power stage at IO-1 ... IO-4
Reading of UID of transponder controlled by bit RD
TP bit is hold according to setting of data hold time
Retry reading / writing of the transponder data, If it fail again, replace transponder
Transponder left the area of the read/write field
Reduce the passing by speed of the transponder
Requested read/write data size does not fit into transponder memory
Check that address or data length fits to transponder data
Communication error with transponder or antenna
General error while accessing transponder data.
Please reset the device. If problem still occur please call ifm service center. Error code F1FE0C
Timeout occurred while accessing transponder data area
Increase the time the transponder is present within the antenna field
Check power supply, must be within range 18V...32V
Check that ambient temperature does not exceed 60C/ 140F, if not possible reduce current consumption at connectors IO-1 . IO-4.
Check that connection to antenna is well and not disturbed by high EMC environment

Check that antenna is connected at connector IO-x.
Short circuit at output driver detected
Check that output at C/Qo has no short circuit
Check power supply at AUX is > 18V
Overload at IO-Port terminal L+ detected
Check load at pin L+ is lower than 500 mA
Check that load at output C/Qo and L+ does not exceed 30W in sum
Communication with antenna lost cause of line break
Internal error: Output driver at IO-Port reached upper limit at terminal C/Qo
Check load at output C/Q dos not exceed 0.5A

Check load at output C/Q does not force output voltage under 13V

Command from another user being processed
